abstract: Sarah Lyall recounts her experience watching 12 movies in theaters across New York City over the span of 48 hours.
lead_paragraph: A reporter indulges a longtime fancy, and spends a Friday — and a Saturday — at the movies, from “Blackhat” to an Altman festival.
snippet: A reporter indulges a longtime fancy, and spends a Friday — and a Saturday — at the movies, from “Blackhat” to an Altman festival.

headline.main: 12 Theaters, Two Days, One Kick in the Head
headline.seo: From ‘American Sniper’ to ‘Macbeth,’ a Reporter’s Moviegoing Spree
headline.print_headline: 12 Theaters, Two Days, One Kick in the Head
